welcome_message_body: Welcome to Haddonfield, the charming city known for its beautiful historic homes and quaint downtown area. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
